basics.name: Florian Silva
basics.label: Devops Big Data
basics.summary: I have been a computer scientist since I removed malware from my very first PC when I was young. I do not hesitate to exchange to find the solution to a problem. Sportsman, I'm always ready for a session, at the moment I'm doing bouldering and I'm starting to have a good level in route too.
basics.headline: It is necessary to have tolerance and the ability to find pleasure in every moment of our lives

work.name: CANAL+
work.summary:
Les problématiques principales de cette mission consistaient à migrer un ensemble d'applications sur le Cloud AWS et assurer un déploiement automatisé et continues de celle-ci.

Environnement technique: Terraform, Packer, Bash, Gitlab, Gitlab CI, Ansible, Docker, Pre-commit, Linux, Windows server, SSH, AWS SSM, AWS ELB, AWS EC2, AWS Elastic Beanstalk, AWS ECR, GitOps
highlights: Developing automations to build Cloud machine images using Packer and Gitlab CI
Setting up Gitlab's cache dependency proxy for Docker image pulls
Configuration and deployment of dedicated gitlab runner agents with Terraform and Packer
Automating infrastructure deployments with dedicated Terraform modules for applications
Application sharing on separate private networks using VPC endpoints (VPCe)
Study and implementation of a Blue/Green and Canary architecture with Terraform and AWS load balancers
Supporting the teams on the open source methodology with the use of issues, merge requests, code review. Creation of verification CIs and code validation using pre-commit.
Regular writing of documentation to ensure optimal knowledge transfer
Contributed to the CloudPosse community on their Beanstalk module by integrating some changes implemented during the mission. https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-elastic-beanstalk-environment
Proposed a new way to manage and prioritize the team's tasks using Gitlab issues

work.name: BNP Paribas Cardif
work.summary:
The mission focuses on the administration of their new Big Data platform Domino Datalab in the Orange OCB Cloud.

Environnement technique : Scrum, JIRA, Linux (Rhel), Windows, Docker, OCB, Kubernetes, Yaml, Shell, Terraform, Gitlab, Apache, Nginx, Grafana, Prometheus, Domino Datalab, Apache airflow, Python, Hadoop HDP 2.6, XFB gateway, SaltStack
highlights: Administration and maintenance of the Domino Datalab platform on the Orange Cloud Business (OCB)
Putting data science models into production via the solution and Kubernetes
Implemented ETL mechanics with Docker and Python code to enable group data import within the solution.
Performed debugging operations on the solution's Kubernetes cluster.
Exchanges with the Cloud support and the Domino Datalab editor to resolve problems or requests for features
Documentation of processes, tools and developments
Creation of a Kanban board to better manage actions and tasks on a daily basis

work.name: Devoteam
work.summary: The mission carried out during the period indicated were as Devoteam consultants.

work.name: BNP Paribas
work.summary:
The main objective is to industrialize the process of deployment and evolution of the Big Data group offer that will be proposed.

Environnement technique : Scrum (Kanban + Sprints), JIRA, DevOps, GitOps
Linux (Rhel, Ubuntu), Windows, Yaml, Shell, Gitlab, Jenkins, Nexus, Sonar, Apache, Nginx, Oracle Exadata, Hue, Jupyterlab, Stack HDP 2.6, Nimsoft, Sphinx doc, autosys, Ansible, Python, Cloud intern, SSH, Kerberos
highlights: Rework, clean up and improve stability of Ansible code to deploy Hadoop cluster
Versioning and setting up a release system with gitlab
Switching the documentation from Word to Sphinx doc to allow a more ergonomic web display and versioning of it
Drastic overhaul of the existing documentation
Definition of the Ranger security rules and policies by default access on the cluster
Testing and validation of the stability of the Hadoop architecture (HDFS, Yarn, Hive, Kerberos...)
Development and automation of post installation unit tests
Increasing the number of nodes and revising the service distribution to ensure service stability in production.
Creation of monitoring rules and alarms for system monitoring teams, automation of their deployment with Ansible
Support for delivery/run teams for the implementation of deployment mechanisms and problem corrections

education.area: Data, network and Internet of Things

meta.note: This is a combined version of the old and new JSON Resume API to provide maximum compatibility. You will notice duplicated values in different fields.
